categories: Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: A Human male Jedi Knight fell to the dark side and killed his Master.

This Human male was a Jedi Knight who tried to learn about the dark side. He believed that he could learn its secrets while remaining true to the light side. However, he fell under the dark side's seductive power. After having an argument with his Master, he gave into his anger and killed his master. His story was featured in a Sith holocron.

In 3997 BBY, during the Great Sith War, Jedi Knight Ulic Qel-Droma decided to infiltrate a dark side cult known as the Krath and dismantle it from within. Jedi Master Odan-Urr tried to warn Qel-Droma about the dangers of the dark side by showing him the story of the Dark Jedi in the Sith holocron. Stunned by the images he saw, Qel-Droma lashed out at Bnar and Odan-Urr, and proclaimed that they would rather do nothing than try to defeat the dark side.
